text: @drsangitareddy @COVID19 @aiims_newdelhi @PMOIndia @MoHFW_INDIA @HospitalsApollo @drharshvardhan He was a great  physician of medicine at Sitaram Bhatia hospital Delhi.I used to visit him at times.May his soul rest in peace🙏🏻 I do not recollect a better gentleman than him #MannKiBaat Dr sb I will miss you @sitarambhartia a Padmashree awardee you gave service without a trough
